EmailTemplate.subject: NCR transformed Mach 1’s shopping experience
EmailTemplate.textOnly: NCR assessed Mach 1’s goals and implemented the right technology to improve their customer experience. With consumer behaviors shifting, Mach 1 needed to deploy self-service solutions to meet the demands of their shoppers and stay competitive in the market. Now, self-service checkout processes about 50% of Mach 1’s transactions (excluding pay-at-the-pump purchases). This deployment allows their associates more time to focus on engaging with shoppers and addressing inventory needs. What happened next? A better store performance overall!
